name: Dark Ball
description:
Welcome to Dark Ball!

Dark Ball is an arcade-style casual game. Your objective is to travel as long as you can avoiding everything in the path. Dark Ball is an avoidance style game with a twist. It is set in a way that your visibility is limited focusing maximum on your quick reflex reaction. Only a true gamer can score well in this world of Dark Ball.

Playing Dark Ball is simple and easy. Touch anywhere on the screen and drag left, right, up, down or diagonally anywhere to move the ball. Avoid everything on the screen or your character will explode and the game will be over!

New Version :
*More levels are added which gives more difficulty and more new screens
*Leaderboard and sharing functions are added. Now brag about your score in front of your friends, family and the world.
*New difficulty

This game is made in collaboration with GEM7CREATION.

This game is made using Buildbox.
